# Tailwind CSS Recommendations

*Generated by Tailwind Sub-Agent*

## Task Analysis

**Project Context**: This project uses Chakra UI v3 as the primary component library with a custom theme system and next-themes for dark mode. The task requires a responsive user dashboard component with comprehensive functionality.

**Current Architecture**:
- Chakra UI v3 with custom system configuration
- Next-themes integration for dark mode
- Custom color tokens and recipes
- Mobile-first responsive design patterns already established

**Tailwind Integration Strategy**: Since Chakra UI handles most component-level styling excellently, Tailwind CSS should be used strategically for:
1. Complex layout compositions that benefit from utility-first approach
2. Custom animations and micro-interactions not covered by Chakra
3. Precise spacing and positioning for dashboard layouts
4. Advanced grid systems and responsive behaviors
5. Performance-critical styling where utility classes reduce bundle size

## When to Use Tailwind vs Chakra UI

### Use Chakra UI For:
- **Core components**: Buttons, inputs, cards, modals (excellent built-in accessibility)
- **Theme-aware colors**: Leveraging the existing `ui.main` color and semantic tokens
- **Component composition**: Box, Stack, Flex for basic layouts
- **Dark mode**: Chakra's color mode system is already well-integrated

### Use Tailwind For:
- **Complex grid layouts**: Dashboard card arrangements, responsive grids
- **Custom animations**: Loading states, hover effects, micro-interactions
- **Precise positioning**: Absolute/fixed positioning for overlays, badges
- **Performance-critical sections**: High-frequency re-renders where utility classes reduce computation
- **Custom responsive breakpoints**: Beyond Chakra's base/md breakpoint pattern

## Utility Class Recommendations

### Dashboard Layout Grid
```css
/* Main dashboard container */
.dashboard-grid {
  @apply grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4 gap-4 md:gap-6 p-4 md:p-6;
}

/* Statistics cards grid */
.stats-grid {
  @apply grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 gap-3 md:gap-4 mb-6;
}

/* Activity list optimized layout */
.activity-list {
  @apply space-y-2 max-h-80 overflow-y-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-gray-300 dark:scrollbar-thumb-gray-600;
}
```

### Loading State Animations
```css
/* Skeleton loading animation */
.skeleton-pulse {
  @apply animate-pulse bg-gradient-to-r from-gray-200 via-gray-300 to-gray-200 dark:from-gray-700 dark:via-gray-600 dark:to-gray-700 bg-[length:200%_100%];
  animation: shimmer 2s infinite;
}

@keyframes shimmer {
  0% { background-position: -200% 0; }
  100% { background-position: 200% 0; }
}

/* Staggered loading for multiple items */
.stagger-load {
  @apply opacity-0 translate-y-4 transition-all duration-300 ease-out;
}
.stagger-load:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0ms; }
.stagger-load:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 100ms; }
.stagger-load:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 200ms; }
```

### Micro-interactions
```css
/* Enhanced hover states for dashboard cards */
.card-hover {
  @apply transition-all duration-200 ease-out hover:scale-[1.02] hover:shadow-lg hover:-translate-y-1;
}

/* Quick action buttons with success states */
.action-button-success {
  @apply relative overflow-hidden;
}
.action-button-success::after {
  @apply content-[''] absolute inset-0 bg-green-500 opacity-0 transition-opacity duration-300;
}
.action-button-success.success::after {
  @apply opacity-20;
}
```

## Responsive Design Strategy

### Breakpoint Strategy
```css
/* Custom breakpoints that complement Chakra's base/md pattern */
.dashboard-responsive {
  /* Mobile-first approach */
  @apply grid-cols-1 gap-3 p-3;
  
  /* Small tablets - 480px */
  @apply sm:grid-cols-2 sm:gap-4 sm:p-4;
  
  /* Medium tablets - 768px (matches Chakra's md) */
  @apply md:grid-cols-2 md:gap-5 md:p-5;
  
  /* Large tablets/small desktop - 1024px */
  @apply lg:grid-cols-3 lg:gap-6 lg:p-6;
  
  /* Desktop - 1280px */
  @apply xl:grid-cols-4 xl:gap-6;
  
  /* Large desktop - 1536px */
  @apply 2xl:grid-cols-5;
}
```

### Profile Section Responsive Layout
```css
.profile-section {
  @apply flex flex-col items-center space-y-4 p-4
         sm:flex-row sm:items-start sm:space-y-0 sm:space-x-4
         lg:flex-col lg:items-center lg:space-x-0 lg:space-y-4
         xl:flex-row xl:items-start xl:space-y-0 xl:space-x-4;
}

.profile-avatar {
  @apply w-16 h-16 sm:w-20 sm:h-20 lg:w-24 lg:h-24 shrink-0;
}

.profile-info {
  @apply text-center sm:text-left lg:text-center xl:text-left min-w-0 flex-1;
}
```

## Performance Optimizations

### CSS Bundle Optimization
```javascript
// tailwind.config.js
module.exports = {
  content: [
    './src/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}',
    // Be specific to avoid scanning unnecessary files
    '!./src/**/*.test.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}',
    '!./src/**/*.stories.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}'
  ],
  corePlugins: {
    // Disable unused features for smaller bundle
    preflight: false, // Chakra handles CSS reset
    container: false, // Use Chakra's Container component
  },
  theme: {
    extend: {
      // Only extend what's needed beyond Chakra's tokens
      animation: {
        'skeleton-pulse': 'shimmer 2s infinite',
        'stagger-fade': 'fadeInUp 0.3s ease-out forwards',
      },
      spacing: {
        '18': '4.5rem', // For specific dashboard spacing needs
        '22': '5.5rem',
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Performance-Critical Classes
```css
/* Use for high-frequency updates like live stats */
.performance-optimized {
  @apply will-change-transform transform-gpu;
}

/* For smooth scrolling areas */
.smooth-scroll {
  @apply scroll-smooth overscroll-contain;
}

/* Optimize repaints for dynamic content */
.repaint-optimized {
  @apply backface-hidden translate-z-0;
}
```

## Dark Mode Integration

### Seamless Dark Mode with Chakra
```css
/* Complement Chakra's dark mode with Tailwind utilities */
.dashboard-theme {
  @apply bg-white dark:bg-gray-900 text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100;
}

/* Custom dark mode variants not covered by Chakra */
.activity-timestamp {
  @apply text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-700 dark:hover:text-gray-200;
}

/* Error states with dark mode support */
.error-state {
  @apply bg-red-50 dark:bg-red-900/20 text-red-800 dark:text-red-200 border border-red-200 dark:border-red-800;
}

/* Success states with dark mode support */
.success-state {
  @apply bg-green-50 dark:bg-green-900/20 text-green-800 dark:text-green-200 border border-green-200 dark:border-green-800;
}
```

## Custom Configuration

### Recommended tailwind.config.js
```javascript
module.exports = {
  darkMode: 'class', // Match next-themes configuration
  content: ['./src/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}'],
  theme: {
    extend: {
      colors: {
        // Complement Chakra's custom colors
        'chakra-main': '#009688', // Match ui.main token
      },
      gridTemplateColumns: {
        // Dashboard-specific grid patterns
        'dashboard-sm': 'repeat(auto-fit, minmax(280px, 1fr))',
        'dashboard-lg': 'repeat(auto-fit, minmax(320px, 1fr))',
        'stats-responsive': 'repeat(auto-fit, minmax(140px, 1fr))',
      },
      spacing: {
        // Match Chakra's spacing scale where possible
        'chakra-4': '1rem',
        'chakra-6': '1.5rem',
      }
    }
  },
  plugins: [
    require('@tailwindcss/container-queries'), // For component-level responsive design
  ],
  corePlugins: {
    preflight: false, // Let Chakra handle global styles
  }
}
```

## Code Examples

### Dashboard Grid Layout with Tailwind + Chakra
```tsx
import { Box } from '@chakra-ui/react'

export const DashboardGrid = ({ children }) => (
  <Box className="min-h-screen bg-white dark:bg-gray-900">
    <div className="dashboard-responsive p-4 md:p-6 max-w-7xl mx-auto">
      <div className="stats-grid mb-8">
        {/* Stats cards */}
      </div>
      <div className="grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6">
        <div className="lg:col-span-2 space-y-6">
          {/* Main content area */}
        </div>
        <div className="space-y-6">
          {/* Sidebar content */}
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </Box>
)
```

### Activity List with Performance Optimization
```tsx
import { VStack } from '@chakra-ui/react'

export const ActivityList = ({ activities, loading }) => (
  <VStack className="activity-list">
    {loading ? (
      Array.from({ length: 5 }).map((_, i) => (
        <div 
          key={i} 
          className="skeleton-pulse h-16 w-full rounded-lg stagger-load"
          style={{ animationDelay: `${i * 100}ms` }}
        />
      ))
    ) : (
      activities.map((activity, index) => (
        <div
          key={activity.id}
          className="w-full p-4 bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-lg 
                     card-hover transform-gpu will-change-transform
                     stagger-load"
          style={{ animationDelay: `${index * 50}ms` }}
        >
          {/* Activity content */}
        </div>
      ))
    )}
  </VStack>
)
```

### Error Boundary with Custom Styling
```tsx
export const DashboardError = ({ error, retry }) => (
  <div className="flex flex-col items-center justify-center min-h-64 p-8">
    <div className="error-state p-6 rounded-lg max-w-md text-center">
      <div className="mb-4 mx-auto w-16 h-16 bg-red-100 dark:bg-red-900/30 
                      rounded-full flex items-center justify-center">
        {/* Error icon */}
      </div>
      <h3 className="text-lg font-semibold mb-2">Something went wrong</h3>
      <p className="text-sm mb-4 opacity-80">{error.message}</p>
      <button 
        onClick={retry}
        className="px-4 py-2 bg-red-600 dark:bg-red-500 text-white rounded-md
                   hover:bg-red-700 dark:hover:bg-red-600 transition-colors
                   focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-red-500 focus:ring-offset-2"
      >
        Try Again
      </button>
    </div>
  </div>
)
```
